45 
46 BrunoEq11ColInt::BrunoEq11ColInt(CollisionIntegral::ARGS args) :
47  CapitelliIntegral(args)
48 {
49  // Load the coefficients
50  std::istringstream ss(args.xml.text());
51  for (int i = 0; i < 7; ++i)
52  if(!(ss >> m_a[i]))
53  args.xml.parseError("Must provide 7 coefficients.");
54 }
55 
56 double BrunoEq11ColInt::compute_(double T)
57 {
58  double x = std::log(T);
59  double e1 = std::exp((x - m_a[2])/m_a[3]);
60  double e2 = std::exp((x - m_a[5])/m_a[6]);
61 
62  return (m_a[0]+x*m_a[1])*e1/(e1+1.0/e1) + m_a[4]*e2/(e2+1.0/e2);
63 }
64 
65 bool BrunoEq11ColInt::isEqual(const CollisionIntegral& ci) const
66 {
67  const BrunoEq11ColInt& compare =
68  dynamic_cast<const BrunoEq11ColInt&>(ci);
69  return (m_a == compare.m_a);
70 }
71 
72 // Register the "Bruno-Eq(11)" CollisionIntegral
73 Mutation::Utilities::Config::ObjectProvider<
74  BrunoEq11ColInt, CollisionIntegral> bruno11_ci("Bruno-Eq(11)");
75 
76 //==============================================================================
77 
78 BrunoEq17ColInt::BrunoEq17ColInt(CollisionIntegral::ARGS args) :
79  CapitelliIntegral(args)
80 {
81  // Load the coefficients
82  std::istringstream ss(args.xml.text());
83  for (int i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
84  if(!(ss >> m_d[i]))
85  args.xml.parseError("Must provide 3 coefficients.");
86 }
87 
88 
89 double BrunoEq17ColInt::compute_(double T)
90 {
91  double x = std::log(T);
92  return m_d[0] + x*(m_d[1] + x*m_d[2]);
93 }
94 
98 bool BrunoEq17ColInt::isEqual(const CollisionIntegral& ci) const
99 {
100  const BrunoEq17ColInt& compare =
101  dynamic_cast<const BrunoEq17ColInt&>(ci);
102  return (m_d == compare.m_d);
103 }
104 
105 // Register the "Bruno-Eq(17)" CollisionIntegral
106 Mutation::Utilities::Config::ObjectProvider<
107  BrunoEq17ColInt, CollisionIntegral> bruno17_ci("Bruno-Eq(17)");
108 
109 //==============================================================================
110 
111 BrunoEq19ColInt::BrunoEq19ColInt(CollisionIntegral::ARGS args) :
112  CapitelliIntegral(args)
113 {
114  // Load the coefficients
115  std::istringstream ss(args.xml.text());
116  for (int i = 0; i < 8; ++i)
117  if(!(ss >> m_g[i]))
118  args.xml.parseError("Must provide 8 coefficients.");
119 }
120 
121 double BrunoEq19ColInt::compute_(double T)
122 {
123  double x = std::log(T);
124  double e1 = std::exp((x-m_g[0])/m_g[1]);
125  double f1 = (x-m_g[6])/m_g[7];
126  return m_g[2]*std::pow(x,m_g[4])*e1/(e1+1.0/e1)+m_g[5]*std::exp(-f1*f1)+m_g[3];
127 }
128 
129 bool BrunoEq19ColInt::isEqual(const CollisionIntegral& ci) const
130 {
131  const BrunoEq19ColInt& compare =
132  dynamic_cast<const BrunoEq19ColInt&>(ci);
133  return (m_g == compare.m_g);
134 }
135 
136 // Register the "Bruno-Eq(19)" CollisionIntegral
137 Mutation::Utilities::Config::ObjectProvider<
138  BrunoEq19ColInt, CollisionIntegral> bruno19_ci("Bruno-Eq(19)");

141 
142 PiraniColInt::PiraniColInt(CollisionIntegral::ARGS args) :
143  CapitelliIntegral(args), m_loaded(true), m_phi0(0.0), m_sig2(0.0)
144 {
145  CollisionType type = args.pair.type();
146  if (type != NEUTRAL_NEUTRAL && type != ION_NEUTRAL)
147  args.xml.parseError(
148  "Laricchiuta-Eq(15) only provided for ion-neutral and neutral-neutral collisions.");
149 
150  // Load the parameters associated with this pair
151  double beta, re;
152  loadPotentialParameters(args, beta, re, m_phi0);
153 
154  if (m_phi0 < 0) {
155  m_loaded = false;
156  return;
157  }
158 
159  m_phi0 = Units("meV").convertToBase(m_phi0);
160 
161  // Lastly, need to compute the fitting parameters based on this type
162  Eigen::Matrix<double, 3,1> b; b << 1.0, beta, beta*beta;
163  std::map<std::string, Eigen::Matrix<double,7,3> >* p_map = NULL;
164 
165  if (type == ION_NEUTRAL) {
166  p_map = &sm_c4;
167  m_sig2 = 0.7564*0.7564*std::pow(beta, 2.0*0.064605)*re*re;
168  } else {
169  p_map = &sm_c6;
170  m_sig2 = 0.8002*0.8002*std::pow(beta, 2.0*0.049256)*re*re;
171  }
172 
173  std::map<std::string, Eigen::Matrix<double,7,3> >::const_iterator
174  iter = p_map->find(args.kind);
175  if (iter == p_map->end())
176  args.xml.parseError(
177  "Laricchiuta-Eq(15) is not supported for " + args.kind + " integral.");
178 
179  m_a = iter->second * b;
180 }
181 
182 double PiraniColInt::compute_(double T)
183 {
184  const double x = std::log(KB*T/m_phi0);
185  const double e1 = std::exp((x - m_a[2])/m_a[3]);
186  const double e2 = std::exp((x - m_a[5])/m_a[6]);
187 
188  return (
189  m_sig2 * std::exp(
190  (m_a[0] + x*m_a[1])*e1/(e1+1.0/e1) +
191  m_a[4]*e2/(e2+1.0/e2)
192  )
193  );
194 }
195 
196 bool PiraniColInt::isEqual(const CollisionIntegral& ci) const
197 {
198  const PiraniColInt& compare =
199  dynamic_cast<const PiraniColInt&>(ci);
200  return (m_a == compare.m_a &&
201  m_phi0 == compare.m_phi0 &&
202  m_sig2 == compare.m_sig2);
203 }
204 
205 
206 void PiraniColInt::loadPotentialParameters(
207  CollisionIntegral::ARGS args, double& beta, double& re, double& phi0)
208 {
209  // First try and find data specific to this pair
210  IO::XmlElement::const_iterator pair = args.pair.findPair(), data;
211  if (pair != args.xml.document()->root().end()) {
212  data = pair->findTag("Pirani-Data");
213  if (data != pair->end()) {
214  data->getAttribute(
215  "beta", beta, "must have a 'beta' attribute.");
216  data->getAttribute(
217  "re", re, "must have an 're' attribute.");
218  data->getAttribute(
219  "phi0", phi0, "must have a 'phi0' attribute.");
220 
221  std::string ref; data->getAttribute("ref", ref);
222  setReference(ref);
223  return;
224  }
225  }
226 
227  // Otherwise, try to guess the parameters from
228  IO::XmlElement& root = args.xml.document()->root();
229  double a1 = 1.0e30 * loadSpeciesParameter(
230  root, "dipole-polarizabilities", args.pair.sp1Name());
231  double a2 = 1.0e30 * loadSpeciesParameter(
232  root, "dipole-polarizabilities", args.pair.sp2Name());
233 
234  if (a1 < 0 || a2 < 0) {
235  phi0 = -1;
236  return;
237  }
238 
239  // softness
240  double s1 = std::pow(a1, 1.0/3.0);
241  double s2 = std::pow(a2, 1.0/3.0);
242 
243  beta = 6.0 + 5.0/(s1 + s2);
244 
245  if (args.pair.type() == NEUTRAL_NEUTRAL) {
246  // neutral-neutral
247  double N1 = loadSpeciesParameter(
248  root, "effective-electrons", args.pair.sp1Name());
249  double N2 = loadSpeciesParameter(
250  root, "effective-electrons", args.pair.sp2Name());
251  if (N1 < 0 || N2 < 0) {
252  phi0 = -1;
253  return;
254  }
255 
256  re = 1.767 * (s1 + s2) / std::pow(a1*a2, 0.095);
257  double Cd = 15.7e3 * a1*a2 / (std::sqrt(a1/N1) + std::sqrt(a2/N2));
258  phi0 = 0.72 * Cd / std::pow(re, 6.0);
259  } else {
260  // ion-neutral
261  double ai, an, z;
262  if (args.pair.sp1().isIon()) {
263  ai = a1;
264  an = a2;
265  z = args.pair.sp1().charge();
266  } else {
267  ai = a2;
268  an = a1;
269  z = args.pair.sp2().charge();
270  }
271  double rho = ai/(z*z*(1+std::pow(2*ai/an, 2.0/3.0))*std::sqrt(an));
272  re = 1.767 * (s1 + s2) / std::pow(a1*a2*(1.0+1.0/rho), 0.095);
273  phi0 = 5.2e3 * z*z*an*(1+rho) / std::pow(re, 4.0);
274  }
275 }
276

278 std::map<std::string, Eigen::Matrix<double,7,3> > init_c4()
279 {
